title: Aluminum foil casserole
description: Our Aluminum Foil Casserole is designed to provide a convenient and efficient solution for serving meals during flights. Its high-quality construction ensures food stays warm and appetizing.

title: Plastic cup
description: Stay hydrated during your journey with our Plastic Cups. Lightweight, sturdy, and perfect for both hot and cold beverages.

title: Airsickness bag
description: For the comfort of our passengers, we provide Airsickness Bags designed for ease of use and quick access in case of motion sickness. Your wellness is our priority.

title: Slipper
description: Enjoy your flight in comfort with our cozy slippers. Designed for optimal comfort and warmth, they're perfect for relaxing during long flights.

title: Wool blanket
description: Stay warm and comfortable with our Wool Blanket. Soft and lightweight, it's an essential companion for a pleasant and restful journey.

title: Economy In-ear Series Headphone
description: Enhance your in-flight entertainment experience with our Economy In-ear Series Headphones. Enjoy movies, music, and more in clear, high-quality audio.

title: Tray
description: Our trays are designed for comfort and convenience, making meal times on your journey easier. Durable and easy to handle, they are perfect for in-flight dining.
